text: Elsa Martinelli (Elisa Tia; 30 January 1935Elsa Martinelli filmography, Corriere della Sera; retrieved 18 March 2015. - 8 July 2017) was an Italian actress and model. In 1956 she won the Silver Bear for Best Actress at the 6th Berlin International Film Festival for playing the title role in Mario Monicelli's Donatella. Martinelli appeared in Four Girls in Town (1957), Manuela (1957), Prisoner of the Volga (1959), Hatari! (1962), The Pigeon That Took Rome (1962), The Trial (1962), The V.I.P.s (1963), Rampage (1963), Woman Times Seven (1967), and Candy (1968). Martinelli died in Rome on 8 July 2017 of lung cancer at the age of 82. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1935 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian television actors Category:Italian models Category:People from Tuscany
title: Elsa Martinelli
